Question.Subject: Is there a way to watch the 82nd Academy Awards live online?
Question.Content:
I'm looking for any dependable and trustworthy method to stream the Oscars live on March 7th, over an internet connection in the US.
I'm willing to pay a reasonable fee for this if necessary. Does anyone know if there is a service to stream such things, or if it is being streamed for free from any sources?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Avatar all the way ;) 9 nominations, how many awards? let us wait n watch
10 Ways to Watch the Oscars 2010 live online for free http://techpp.com/2010/03/02/10-ways-to-watch-the-oscars-2010-live-online-for-free/

Answer.Content:
Avatar all the way ;) 9 nominations, how many awards? let us wait n watch
